Optiepakketten
• Advance-pakket (Elektrisch glazen panorama-dak, bi-xenon koplampen, koplampreiniging, LED dagrijverlichting, Rijstrooksensor)
• Leder-pakket (Lederen interieur, Elektrisch verstelbare bestuurdersstoel, Lederen stuurwiel en versnellingspook, Lendesteunen (verstelbaar), Sportstoelen, Voorstoelen verwarmd)

trans:
Maintenance booklets: Present (maintain dealer)
Technical data
Engine capacity: 1,984 cc
Number of cylinders: 4
Power: 155 kW (211 HP)
Top speed: 213 km / h
Acceleration (0-100): 7.3 s
Wheelbase: 260 cm
Empty weight: 1,589 kg
Load capacity: 641 kg
GVW: 2,230 kg
Max. tensile weight: 2,200 kg (unbraked 750 kg)
Energy label: G
Functionality
Number of seats: 5
Dimensions (LxWxH): 453 x 181 x 170 cm
Financial data
Motor vehicle tax: € 267 - € 292 per quarter
VAT / Margin: Margin (Companies cannot reclaim VAT from the tax)
Original catalog value: € 55,943
Option packages
• Advance package (Electric panoramic glass roof, bi-xenon headlamps, headlamp cleaning, LED daytime running lights, Lane sensor)
• Leather package (Door leather, Electrically adjustable driver's seat, Leather steering wheel and gear lever, Loan brackets (adjustable), Sports seats, Heated front seats)
Exterior
• bi-xenon headlights
• Exterior mirrors electrically folding
• Exterior mirrors electrically adjustable and heated
• Chrome parts exterior
• Roof rails
• Low beam automatically
• Electric panoramic glass roof
• headlamp cleaning
• LED daytime running lights
• Alloy wheels 17"
• front fog lamps
• Towbar foldable
Infotainment
• Radio CD / MP3 player
• Steering wheel multifunctional
Interior
• Air conditioning (automatic)
• Arm support for
• Driver's seat adjustable in height
• On-board computer
• Cruise control
• Electric windows front and rear
• Electrically adjustable driver's seat
• Leather interior
